analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule dangerously disregards the explicit warning of the 9/11 Commission Report (2004) against politicizing national security personnel.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, which are critical to maintaining national security. The reference to the 9/11 Commission Report underscores the importance of nonpartisan governance in security roles.
